edu.wpi.cs.kjsmith

Class Frame

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.cs.kjsmith.Frame

  • public class Frame
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which represents a single memory frame (buffer)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Frame

        public Frame()
        Default constructor. Sets all values to default.

      • Frame

        public Frame(java.lang.String content,
             java.lang.Boolean dirty,
             java.lang.Boolean pinned,
             int blockId)
        Parameterized constructor
        Parameters:
        content - The content of the file, always 4 KiB
        dirty - Whether the content of the file has changed and needs to be written to disk
        pinned - Request to keep this block in memory
        blockId - ID of the block, -1 means frame is empty

      • updateRecord

        public java.lang.Boolean updateRecord(int num,
                                      java.lang.String record)
        Updates a specific record
        Parameters:
        num - The record number to update
        record - The new record content
        Returns:
        True if the record was updated, false otherwise
        See Also:

        private void updateLastUsed()
        Updates the last used time to the current time, should be called whenever a Frame is updated or accessed
